query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS system_settings (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  settingKey VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  settingValue TEXT,
  description TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_setting_key (settingKey)
);

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4LxBqKfHv1LE9mk.f65588d6698e --database XpSHcSiEisTmX38X46V9tQ --execute 
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS system_settings (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  settingKey VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  settingValue TEXT,
  description TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_setting_key (settingKey)
);
